abstract: A group of Russian billionaires fighting a BP alliance deal are also at odds with Prime Minister Vladimir V. Putin of Russia.
snippet: A group of Russian billionaires fighting a BP alliance deal are also at odds with Prime Minister Vladimir V. Putin of Russia.
lead_paragraph: BP’s directors who serve on the board of a Russian joint venture voted against a proposal to swap shares and join an exploration venture with Rosneft, escalating a long-running dispute.

headline.main: BP’s Dispute Over a Joint Venture in Russia Intensifies
headline.print_headline: BP’s Dispute Over a Joint Venture in Russia Intensifies
